vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Private_Bank.cashOut (patch_9.sol#19-26):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_9.sol#21-24)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_9.sol#22)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMessage in Log.addMessage (patch_9.sol#42) is a local variable never initialiazed
